Description: Fragmentary hat a - main striped textile, warp faced corded with silk warp and cotton weft, warp originally in green, cream and pink stripes. b - tapestry used for brim and piping decorated with birds c - triangle of silk and silver textile, silver thread d - small piece of plain blue linen, two layers e - outer lining f - inner, hidden lining Cotton wool wadding throughout between a and f.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
